sentences.sContent: After they finished their commission business, Chernomyrdin came to see me to brief me on events in Russia and Yeltsin’s prospects for reelection.
sentences.sContent_eng: After they finished their commission business, Chernomyrdin came to see me to brief me on events in Russia and Yeltsin’s prospects for reelection.
sentences.sCn: 在他们完成了使命后，他来拜访我，向我简单介绍了俄罗斯的近况和叶利钦再次当选的前景。

sentences.sContent: Every member of the House of Representatives and about one-third of the Senate is up for reelection in any given election year.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every member of the House of Representatives and about one-third of the Senate is up for reelection in any given election year.
sentences.sCn: 在每个规定的选举年中，全国都要重新选举全体的众议院议员和大约三分之一的参议院议员。
